GraphQLQueries: query queryTariffDepot($first: Int) { tariffDepotResult: queryTariffDepot(first: $first) { nodes { guid description } } }
query queryCustomerCompany( $first: Int) { companyList: queryCustomerCompany( first: $first) { nodes { guid name }}}
query queryTank( $first: Int) { tankList: queryTank( first: $first) { nodes { guid description }}}
query queryTariffDepot( $first: Int) { DepotList: queryTariffDepot( first: $first) { nodes { guid description }}}
query queryTemplateEstimation( $first: Int) { DepotList: queryTemplateEstimation(first: $first) { nodes { guid template_name }}}
query queryCodeValues( $first: Int) { CodeValueList: queryCodeValues(first: $first) { nodes { code_val description }}}
query queryStoringOrderTankCount( $first: Int) { sotList: queryStoringOrderTankCount(first: $first) { nodes { guid tank_no }}}
query queryCleaning( $first: Int) { CleanList: queryCleaning(first: $first) { nodes { guid }}}
query queryOutGates( $first: Int) { outList: queryOutGates(first: $first) { nodes { guid driver_name }}}
query queryBillingSOT($first: Int) { queryBillingSOT( first: $first ) { nodes {guid  sot_guid}}}
